attributes.action: Ban Emergency Sirens after late hours
attributes.additional_details:
I have the up most respect for the emergency service and the work they do. But I feel it is disrespectful to have sirens going off in the early hours of the morning (for example 2:00am).

I'm sure at 2am, the emergency lights should be enough for any car users that are driving during those hours.

Please ban the use of sirens from 11:00pm to 6:00am
